content.rendered:
OUR SERVICES

Making the world a smaller place

THE EVOLUTION OF DOMESTIC PARCEL SERVICES OVER THE YEARS

The Indian domestic parcel shipping industry has surely come a long way. The different modes of transport today have a wide range of delivery options and shipping facilities to ensure the timely and safe delivery of packages. These services are not only used by individuals sending parcels from one place to the other but are also used by industries to a large extent, the main one being e-commerce.

In a bid to become the best domestic courier service in India, we at Delhivery offer a wide range of services that are convenient for our customers. Domestic courier services in India these days not only offer convenient options like Express and Same/Next Day shipping services but also the option to book domestic parcel services online with live-tracking capabilities.

Known as one of the best domestic courier services in India, Delhivery offers all these facilities and more to ensure that customers benefit from their agile domestic services.

CHALLENGES FACED BY DOMESTIC PARCEL SERVICES IN INDIA

  • When it comes to offering the most efficient, reliable and fastest domestic courier service in India, there are certain issues that can arise while delivering a parcel. India with its various seasons and difficult terrains put the last mile capabilities of courier services to test.
  • Tackling such issues requires a domestic parcel service in India which is well aware of the seasonal demands and regions. They should be equipped with dedicated personnel who can navigate the routes to ensure that these challenges are met with ease.
  • Delhivery offers one of the most reliable domestic courier services in India with a fast and growing delivery network that ensures that the parcels are delivered on time, every time.

DELHIVERY’S TRANSPORT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

Our domestic courier services in India are backed by an integrated transport management system that enables the customers as well as the company to ensure seamless and convenient operations for all services related to domestic couriers in India.

With Delhivery’s transport management system for sending domestic couriers in India, customers can easily schedule convenient pick-ups and track their orders in real-time, while our domestic parcel service manages returns and replacements, and even helps with fraud detection. The TMS system helps move parcels from origin to destination efficiently, reliably, and cost-effectively.

FLEXIBLE PAYMENT AND SCHEDULING OPTIONS FOR DOMESTIC PARCEL DELIVERY

When it comes to domestic courier services in India, no order or parcel delivery can be treated as the same. Delhivery offers flexibility in payment options as well as in the ability to schedule preferred time slots for deliveries via domestic parcel service, based on a client’s convenience and availability.

Delhivery provides its customers with options like on-demand delivery, same day or next day delivery, as well as time-defined and slot-based deliveries.

DEDICATED CUSTOMER SERVICE

Delhivery, is one of the best domestic courier services in India. The company is known to provide and assist its customers efficiently at each and every step. Right from placing orders to scheduling pick-ups as well as real-time tracking of their deliveries, Delhivery provides dedicated 24/7 support.

Delhivery believes in maintaining long-term customer relationships, which is why we are dedicated to providing complete assistance along with efficient services when it comes to domestic parcel delivery.
